name: Convicts
description:
You're magic and you barely understand where it comes from. Your mom has encouraged you to use your magic by giving you a family's heirloom. A magic bracelet that can only be worn by the bloodline. However, things go very badly when you come home from a long day to see your mother's mangled body. Things only get worse when a mysterious, but deadly cloaked figure seems to be the cause of it.

The game is currently in development, and only the epilogue has been released.

This game will be a interactive slow burn adventure that'll offer many choices that'll impact the direction of the story. It's non-linear, which helps create a true choose your adventure game. This game focuses on M/M relationships only from a gay man point of view.

Please feel free to leave any feedback. This is my first game and I want to really make it the best way I can for everyone's enjoyment.
